events.title: Campus Frenzy
events.description: A thrilling campus-wide adventure combining quizzes, landmark exploration, and fun tasks to test creativity, teamwork and time management.

events.title: Echoes of Dhol - Workshop
events.description: Dhol-Tasha is the pride of Maharashtrian culture. Many people are interested to see as well as play Dhol-Tasha. Through this workshop, we will teach Participants to play Dhol.

events.title: Jaagruthi
events.description: An engaging and interactive 4-hour motivational talkshow where three inspiring guests share their personal journeys and valuable insights.

events.title: Cricket Net Practice
events.description: Test your batting skills with the Youth Red Cross at Riviera! Face 2 thrilling overs against an automated ball machine and prove your mettle on the pitch!

events.title: Visionary Tales
events.description: A two-stage event combining a case study challenge, where teams present solutions and earn peer votes, while participating in exciting games.

events.title: Gully Cricket
events.description: The Gully Cricket event lets you enjoy the nostalgic feeling from your childhood.

events.title: Lens Quest
events.description: A unique and interactive photography challenge that includes a thrilling quest and capturing photographs based on the clues, all within a set time limit.

events.title: Pitch Perfect - Western
events.description: A western solo singing contest where you can showcase your vocal skills and captivate the crowd!

events.title: 221B Baker Street
events.club: Institution of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineers (IETE)
events.description: An inspiring journey of curiosity and creativity unfolds at 221B Baker Street, promising unforgettable moments and cherished memories.
